Editing the Booklet Composition

When you click EDIT to open the Booklet, no reports will immediately execute. You will first see the Booklet Composition panel with the structure for the selected Booklet populated. From here, you can make any desired changes to the order of reports, or add/remove reports from the Booklet structure. Then, click PREVIEW to see the modified report without committing the changes or click SAVE to commit the changes to this booklet structure.
